title: Trickery Domain
content: and powers of aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.The target can't be Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by them, and when these creatures attack it, they do so with disadvantage.Until Long Rest Melee Concentration Shield of Faith Lv 1 Abjuration Bonus ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot Protect a creature from attacks increase: Increase its Armour Class by 2 Until Long Rest 18m/60ft Concentration Aid Lv 2 Abjuration ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot 5 Healing Heal your allies and increase
